text: Roamn Yazvinskyy is a Ukrainian luger who competed in the mid-2000s. He competed in the men's doubles event at the 2006 Winter Olympics in Turin, but crashed out toward the end of the first run. Yazvinskyy was sent to a hospital with an unspecified head injury. ==References== *2006 luge men's doubles results *USA Today February 16, 2006 article on the luge crashes at Cesana Pariol during the 2006 Winter Olympics Category:Living people Category:Lugers at the 2006 Winter Olympics Category:Ukrainian male lugers Category:Olympic lugers of Ukraine Category:Year of birth missing (living people)
title: Roman Yazvinskyy
